<!---->          <div id="ember223" class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view"><div tabindex="-1" id="ember224" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view">      <div dir="ltr" id="ember225" class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary  ember-view"><!---->
  <div id="ember226" class="feed-shared-text__text-view feed-shared-text-view white-space-pre-wrap break-words ember-view"><span><span id="ember229" class="ember-view"><span>As we navigate the changing course of the COVID-19 situation, our commitment to meeting the needs of our patients, customers, and employees remains unwavering.

Curaleaf dispensaries remain open. We have been designated as an essential service in all states where we have dispensaries, which means that we are able to continue to provide vital cannabis products.

In order to serve our patients and customers best, the first operating hour of each day is now prioritized for those 60 years of age or older. We are also starting to offer a new service called WaitlistMe.

This app allows our staff to add patients and customers to a digital waiting list, so they can wait in their cars instead of standing in line outside our dispensaries. WaitlistMe is currently available in Maryland, New Jersey and Nevada, and we will be adding more states each day.

There is up-to-date information with state-by-state details at the link below, which we encourage you to check regularly.

Our priority is the health, wellbeing, and safety of our patients, customers, and employees. We thank you for your patience and support as we continue our commitment to provide the services and products you rely on, with confidence. </span></span><a tabindex="0" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank" href="https://bit.ly/2QzCVW2" id="ember233" class="feed-shared-text-view__hyperlink ember-view">https://bit.ly/2QzCVW2</a></span><!----></div>

  <div id="ember173" class="feed-shared-text__text-view feed-shared-text-view white-space-pre-wrap break-words ember-view"><span><span id="ember176" class="ember-view"><span>Curaleaf remains committed to providing our customers with the products they rely on. We will continue to serve our communities while doing everything we can to minimize risk by working closely with local and state governments and responding as quickly as possible to the evolving situation.

We have received an essential services designation to remain open during this time for our patients in Arizona, Connecticut, Florida, Massachusetts, Maryland, New Jersey, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Illinois, Nevada and certain locales in California.

We are encouraging customers to take advantage of delivery, mobile ordering and express pickup options in the states where these services are available, and we are working with regulators to explore making these options available in states where they currently are prohibited. 

We are also working state by state to implement additional measures such as enforcing social distancing, providing designated early hours for seniors, exploring curb-side delivery options and moving waiting customer lines outside.

Now more than ever we are focused on our mission to improve lives by providing clarity around cannabis and confidence around consumption, while keeping the health of our patients, customers and employees as our foremost priority.</span></span></span><!----></div>
</div>

  <div id="ember461" class="feed-shared-text__text-view feed-shared-text-view white-space-pre-wrap break-words ember-view"><span><span id="ember464" class="ember-view"><span>Today we’re beginning sales at our </span><a data-control-name="hashtag" target="_self" href="/feed/hashtag/?highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6643855228246511616&keywords=%23Hanover&originTrackingId=DhiwwcXBKh38jPHTSTSe%2FQ%3D%3D" id="ember467" class="hashtag-link ember-view"><span dir="ltr" id="ember468" class="hashtag-a11y ember-view"><span class="visually-hidden">hashtag</span><span aria-hidden="true">#</span><span class="hashtag-a11y__name">Hanover</span></span></a><span> MA medical dispensary of Curaleaf’s custom Veterans Cannabis Project 5-pack pre-rolls to support veterans’ access to medical cannabis.

$1 from every purchase goes to support the Veterans Cannabis Project and Massachusetts Fallen Heroes.

Veterans Cannabis Project Executive and U.S. Air Force Veteran Executive Director </span></span><a target="_self" href="/in/ACoAAAmVUIYBpsAZ0UCqPDDWk_0UGcg4dfqayKA/" id="ember472" class="tap-target feed-shared-text-view__mention ember-view"><span data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAmVUIYBpsAZ0UCqPDDWk_0UGcg4dfqayKA" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE">Doug Distaso</span></a><button class="entity-hovercard__a11y-trigger" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="See more about Doug Distaso" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAmVUIYBpsAZ0UCqPDDWk_0UGcg4dfqayKA" data-entity-hovercard-trigger="click"></button><span id="ember476" class="ember-view"><span> said, "As a veteran who lives the post-service struggle and was lucky enough to escape the dangerous opioids prescribed to me, I try to make those who are struggling more comfortable searching for help."</span></span></span><!----></div>

  <div id="ember2023" class="feed-shared-text__text-view feed-shared-text-view white-space-pre-wrap break-words ember-view"><span><span id="ember2026" class="ember-view"><span>This </span><a data-control-name="hashtag" target="_self" href="/feed/hashtag/?highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6640973319829094400&keywords=%23WomensHistoryMonth&originTrackingId=NvcRFJcJ0ak5b%2BFfeghmrA%3D%3D" id="ember2029" class="hashtag-link ember-view"><span dir="ltr" id="ember2030" class="hashtag-a11y ember-view"><span class="visually-hidden">hashtag</span><span aria-hidden="true">#</span><span class="hashtag-a11y__name">WomensHistoryMonth</span></span></a><span>, we are looking to shine a spotlight on the female members of the </span><a data-control-name="hashtag" target="_self" href="/feed/hashtag/?highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6640973319829094400&keywords=%23Curaleaf&originTrackingId=NvcRFJcJ0ak5b%2BFfeghmrA%3D%3D" id="ember2033" class="hashtag-link ember-view"><span dir="ltr" id="ember2034" class="hashtag-a11y ember-view"><span class="visually-hidden">hashtag</span><span aria-hidden="true">#</span><span class="hashtag-a11y__name">Curaleaf</span></span></a><span> team, who are helping us lead the way towards a world where cannabis is welcomed and understood. This is Sam, a team-member from our Bellmawr, NJ cultivation facility.

Sam is in charge of plant propagation and takes care of our "mother" plants (as shown in the photo). Sam began working in the industry as a front-of-house cannabis consultant and joined Curaleaf last May. For Sam, her job is "all about plant maintenance. This means working with our giant, vegetative plants, which we take cuts off of to create thousands of clones. From there, we get these clones nice and healthy and ready to flower.”

Sam adds: “I came to Curaleaf to get involved in growing—that is what I really wanted to do. I have a plant background in biology and plant science. After I was able to get the opportunity to make the jump, it has definitely benefited me a lot in my career.”</span></span></span><!----></div>
</div>

We will continue to serve our communities while doing everything we can to minimize risk by working closely with local and state governments and responding as quickly as possible to the evolving situation.\n\nWe have received an essential services designation to remain open during this time for our patients in Arizona, Connecticut, Florida, Massachusetts, Maryland, New Jersey, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Illinois, Nevada and certain locales in California.\n\nWe are encouraging customers to take advantage of delivery, mobile ordering and express pickup options in the states where these services are available, and we are working with regulators to explore making these options available in states where they currently are prohibited. \n\nWe are also working state by state to implement additional measures such as enforcing social distancing, providing designated early hours for seniors, exploring curb-side delivery options and moving waiting customer lines outside.\n\nNow more than ever we are focused on our mission to improve lives by providing clarity around cannabis and confidence around consumption, while keeping the health of our patients, customers and employees as our we navigate the changing course of the COVID-19 situation, our commitment to meeting the needs of our patients, customers, and employees remains unwavering.\n\nCuraleaf dispensaries remain open. We have been designated as an essential service in all states where we have dispensaries, which means that we are able to continue to provide vital cannabis products.\n\nIn order to serve our patients and customers best, the first operating hour of each day is now prioritized for those 60 years of age or older. We are also starting to offer a new service called WaitlistMe.\n\nThis app allows our staff to add patients and customers to a digital waiting list, so they can wait in their cars instead of standing in line outside our dispensaries. WaitlistMe is currently available in Maryland, New Jersey and Nevada, and we will be adding more states each day.\n\nThere is up-to-date information with state-by-state details at the link below, which we encourage you to check regularly.\n\nOur priority is the health, wellbeing, and safety of our patients, customers, and employees. We thank you for your patience and support as we continue our commitment to provide the services and products you rely on, with confidence.
